name: prosecutorial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the process of prosecuting someone for (= officially accusing them of) a crime: the process by which the Justice Department makes prosecutorial decisions (= decisions to prosecute) his prosecutorial zeal (= eagerness to prosecute people)
relating to a prosecutor: evidence of prosecutorial misconduct (= wrong behaviour by the prosecutor)
